data.caption: (1) Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On November 20, 2023 (2) Submission Of Standalone & Consolidated Audited Financial Results ('Financial Results') For The Quarter Ended On June 30, 2023 Along With Auditor'S Review Reports Thereon
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the board of Directors at its meeting held on November 30, 2023 has inter - alia, taken the following decisions :

1. Considered and approved the unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and consolidated) for the Quarter ended on June 30, 2023.

2. Taken note of resignation of Mr. Mahendra Nath Verma, Non - Executive Independent Director of the company w.e.f. November 20, 2023

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: With reference to the provisions of SEBI Circular CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated November 19, 2018 read with Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 yet to be finalized and its is expected to be finalized and published on November 20, 2023.Therefore we are unable to approved and publish the financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2023 as well.We further submit to your goodself that we will inform the exchange regarding holding the meetings for approval of financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the period ended June 30, 2023 and subsequently for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2023.

data.caption: Standalone & Consolidated Audited Financial Results ('Financial Results') For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended On March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on August 31, 2023 has inter- alia, taken the following decisions:

Considered and approved the Audited Financial Results Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2023

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: With reference to the  SEBI Circular CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated November 19, 2018 read with Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the annual Financial Statements (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and financial year ended on March 31, 2023 yet to be finalized due to technical problems in the software system of the company, as informed earlier.Therefore, we are unable to approved and publish the financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 as well.We further submit to your goodself, that we are shorting out all the problems and will shortly inform the exchange regarding  holding the meetings for approval of annual Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) for the period ended March 31, 2023 and for the quarter ended June 30, 2023.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: This is bring to your kind notice that due to the unforeseen difficulties, finalization of Financial Results for the Quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, is taking time longer than expected ahead of prescribed period.Hence, under this situation, we sincerely bring to your kind attention that declaration of our Financial Results as aforesaid is getting delayed beyond time prescribed under Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 i.e. February 14, 2023. Though, we are trying our level best to do the same, we will inform your good self, the next date of the Board meeting for declaration of Financial Results for the Quarter an Nine Months ended December 31, 2022 in due course of time.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: With reference to the SEBI Circular CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated November 19, 2018 read with provisions of Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that due to sudden technical glitch in the software system of the Company, the Board of Directors was constrained to consider the Financials Statements (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2023.The date of the next meeting of the Board for consideration and approval of the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2023 including Dividend, if any on the Equity Shares will be informed separately.

data.caption: Submission Of Standalone & Consolidated Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022 Alongwith Limited Review Reports Thereon
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulations 30, 33 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held today i.e. February 20, 2023 has, inter alia, considered and approved the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022. A copy of the aforesaid results, as reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors, alongwith the Limited Review Reports thereon (Standalone & Consolidated) issued by M/s T R Chadha & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company, are attached herewith as Annexure A, B and C respectively.

data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulations 30, 33 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held today i.e. November 14, 2022 has, inter alia, considered and approved the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2022. data.caption: (1) Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 13, 2022 (2) Submission Of Standalone & Consolidated Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2022 Alongwith Limited Review Reports Thereon
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of Regulations 30, 33 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held today i.e. August 13, 2022 has, inter alia, taken the following decisions:

a) Considered and approved the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter ended June 30, 2022. A copy of the aforesaid results, as reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors, alongwith the Limited Review Reports thereon (Standalone & Consolidated) issued by M/s T R Chadha & Co. LLP, Statutory Auditors of the Company, are attached herewith as Annexure A, B and C respectively;

b) Recommended to the Members, issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures for an amount upto Rs. 750 Crores (Rupees Seven Hundred Fifty Crores Only), for their approval at the forthcoming Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Submission Of Standalone & Consolidated Audited Financial Results ('Financial Results') For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended On March 31, 2022 Along With Audit Reports Thereon
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at its meeting held on June 11, 2022, has inter - alia, taken the following decisions:
-Considered and approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2022.
-Not recommended any Dividend on the Equity Shares of the Company for the FY 2021-22.

Pursuant to the provisions of Regulations 30, 33 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find attached herewith:
(i) Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2022 (both Standalone and Consolidated) - Annexure A;
(ii) Audit Reports on Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the Year ended on March 31, 2022 issued by M/s T R Chadha & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company - Annexures B and C respectively;
(iii) Declaration that the Statutory Auditors have issued the aforesaid Audit Reports with unmodified opinion - Annexure D.
